text: Sano naga n'di nao imo (Asilamuo pa ngondo) ni kusaka kwaswalisya swala, basi lijime namwe likuga line mwa jamanjao soni ajigale yida yao, sano pati amasile kusujudu, basi awe (nkutenda ulinda) kunyuma kwenu, ni liiche likuga line lyanganiliswali, basi ni liswali namwe, nombe nao akalamuche nikujigala yida yao (achiswaliji), awala wakanile akasasachililaga yanti n'di nyyipwanyile yida yenu ni ndundu syenu, basi ni an'gungumuchile mwanakamo (tichi!) Sano chipawe pangali ulemwa kukwenu kutuula yida yenu naga n'di nkwete isausyo ya wula kapena n'di wakulwala, nambo kalamukani. Chisimu Allah walinganyichisye achimakafili ilagasyo yakwalusya
